name: Royal Aviation
about: Royal Aviation, located at John Wayne Airport in Costa Mesa, California, has been providing quality flight instruction since 1976. We offer comprehensive training programs for private, instrument, commercial, and flight instructor certifications. Our experienced instructors create a fun and relaxed learning environment, whether you're flying for recreation or a career. As a flying club, we also offer aircraft rentals at competitive rates. With a history of training numerous students who have become major airline pilots, Royal Aviation is dedicated to helping you achieve your aviation goals. Contact us at (714) 557-7174 to start your flight training journey.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Instrument Rating (IR)"]
